def calc_pi(max_iterations):
    result = 1.0
    subtract = True
    for i in range(3, max_iterations, 2):
        if subtract:
            result -= 1.0/i
            subtract = False
        else:
            result += 1.0/i
            subtract = True
    result *= 4
    PRX(result)
    return result
def cc1():  # rpn: export
  calc_pi(10)
  calc_pi(50)
  calc_pi(100)
  calc_pi(500)
  calc_pi(1000)
